title: If I See You Wearing Any of These Cashmere Accessories, I'll Know You Have Expensive Taste
text: This may not be groundbreaking, but one standout revelation from the cold-weather season thus far is the undeniable charm of cashmere. We often talk about cashmere sweaters, but today, let's shine a light on cashmere accessories—the delightful little touches that often fly under the radar.Whether you're an accessory-minded shopper like me or not, cashmere pieces are the ultimate winter must-haves. Think cashmere beanies, scarves, gloves, and socks. These luxurious additions can effortlessly elevate any outfit, lending that sophisticated vibe we crave.Luckily, the market is bursting with cashmere accessories to suit every budget. There's something for everyone, from investment pieces by beloved brands like White + Warren and Lisa Yang to budget-friendly finds from stores like J.Crew and Mango. Each item radiates the same luxe, upscale feel, making them perfect for last-minute gifts or a little treat for yourself on payday.Curious about my top picks for cashmere accessories that promise to be both cozy and stylish? Keep scrolling. Your winter wardrobe is about to get a chic upgrade. You're welcome. Who What Wear readers can't get enough of this scarf. Nordstrom Brushed Cashmere Tech Gloves These gloves are a game changer. My hands no longer freeze while I'm using my phone in the winter. j.crew Cashmere-Blend Trouser Socks Ultra-cozy and ultra-chic with loafers, boots, or sneakers. j.crew Oversized Cashmere Wrap You'll want this scarf in all three of the neutral hues. Nordstrom Cashmere Lined Leather Touchscreen Gloves Another pair of elegant tech gloves. Nordstrom Tissue Weight Wool & Cashmere Scarf This scarf comes in nine colors, but the expensive-looking burgundy is my favorite. j.crew Cashmere Tech-Touch Gloves Swooning my way to the checkout process.  ARCH4 Blaine Cashmere-Blend Bouclé Beanie This oatmeal bouclé beanie will keep you warm in style. This is an accessory I'm always regretful I don't have when the winter weddings roll around. If you invest in cashmere accessories, you'll want to grab this tool to keep your pieces pill-free and long-lasting. Comme Si The Cashmere Socks Suddenly, every stylish person is pairing their loafers with gray cashmere socks. MANGO 100% Cashmere Gloves Gray is an enduring color trend this season. LISA YANG Cashmere Earmuffs I never used to like earmuffs until I tried these. j.crew Cashmere-Wool Blend Poncho This cashmere poncho will make you look like you have a high net worth. j.crew Ribbed Cashmere Beanie Come Monday, this will be sold out—guaranteed. White + Warren Cashmere Scarf White + Warren's cashmere is chef's kiss. & Other Stories Pure Brushed-Cashmere Beanie If you can't tell yet, I'm really into brushed cashmere. LISA YANG Brushed-Cashmere Mittens Your hands will be so happy all winter long. If you're looking to incorporate the cape trend into your winter wardrobe, this is the scarf to move forward with. The color, fabric, and brand—everything—are perfection. bombas Merino Cashmere Blend Rib Calf Socks If you haven't tried Bombas socks yet, now is the time. banana republic Signature Cashmere Scarf Who What Wear editors can't get enough of Banana Republic's signature cashmere. Jenni Kayne Cashmere Socks Sale alert—don't miss out.  & Other Stories Cashmere Knit Scarf This beautiful scarf comes in six other colors. Lands' End Ez Touch Screen Cashmere Lined Leather Gloves For $67, I'm purchasing two pairs to place in each of my favorite coats. This bold beanie is too cute to forget about anytime soon.  By Anthropologie Solid Cashmere Socks Style these like a French fashion person by pairing them with a blazer, jeans, and loafers. You can't beat this price point. GUEST IN RESIDENCE Cable-Knit Wool and Cashmere-Blend Balaclava Winter weather has really been in full force lately, and balaclavas are the trendiest accessory keeping fashion people warm. ARCH4 Jessie Ribbed Cashmere Gloves Why only keep your hands warm when you can warm up your arms too? NakedCashmere The Cashmere Home Set The perfect last-minute gift idea for yourself or someone on your list. White + Warren Cashmere Ribbed Sock Pack Your feet deserve to receive a luxurious treatment. Cos Pure Brushed Cashmere Triangle Scarf Don't miss out—this best-selling triangle scarf is selling out quickly! I'd wear these in my reformer Pilates classes. Nikki Chwatt is an associate fashion editor based in New York City. She joined Who What Wear in 2024 after writing fashion, beauty, and lifestyle content for WWD, Well+Good, Editorialist, and more. With a passion for personal style and the creativity that comes with it, one of Chwatt's goals is to help others understand that there is no such thing as a “good” or “bad” style; it’s just about putting an outfit together that makes you feel confident in yourself. When she's not writing, you can find her taking a Pilates class, reading a powerful romance novel, or exploring a new wellness spot in Manhattan.
html:
This may not be groundbreaking, but one standout revelation from the cold-weather season thus far is the undeniable charm of cashmere. We often talk about cashmere sweaters, but today, let's shine a light on cashmere accessories—the delightful little touches that often fly under the radar.

Whether you're an accessory-minded shopper like me or not, cashmere pieces are the ultimate winter must-haves. Think cashmere beanies, scarves, gloves, and socks. These luxurious additions can effortlessly elevate any outfit, lending that sophisticated vibe we crave.

Luckily, the market is bursting with cashmere accessories to suit every budget. There's something for everyone, from investment pieces by beloved brands like White + Warren and Lisa Yang to budget-friendly finds from stores like J.Crew and Mango. Each item radiates the same luxe, upscale feel, making them perfect for last-minute gifts or a little treat for yourself on payday.

Curious about my top picks for cashmere accessories that promise to be both cozy and stylish? Keep scrolling. Your winter wardrobe is about to get a chic upgrade. You're welcome.

Who What Wear readers can't get enough of this scarf.

Nordstrom

Brushed Cashmere Tech Gloves

These gloves are a game changer. My hands no longer freeze while I'm using my phone in the winter.

j.crew

Cashmere-Blend Trouser Socks

Ultra-cozy and ultra-chic with loafers, boots, or sneakers.

j.crew

Oversized Cashmere Wrap

You'll want this scarf in all three of the neutral hues.

Nordstrom

Cashmere Lined Leather Touchscreen Gloves

Another pair of elegant tech gloves.

Nordstrom

Tissue Weight Wool & Cashmere Scarf

This scarf comes in nine colors, but the expensive-looking burgundy is my favorite.

j.crew

Cashmere Tech-Touch Gloves

Swooning my way to the checkout process. 

ARCH4

Blaine Cashmere-Blend Bouclé Beanie

This oatmeal bouclé beanie will keep you warm in style.

This is an accessory I'm always regretful I don't have when the winter weddings roll around.

If you invest in cashmere accessories, you'll want to grab this tool to keep your pieces pill-free and long-lasting.

Comme Si

The Cashmere Socks

Suddenly, every stylish person is pairing their loafers with gray cashmere socks.

MANGO

100% Cashmere Gloves

Gray is an enduring color trend this season.

LISA YANG

Cashmere Earmuffs

I never used to like earmuffs until I tried these.

j.crew

Cashmere-Wool Blend Poncho

This cashmere poncho will make you look like you have a high net worth.

j.crew

Ribbed Cashmere Beanie

Come Monday, this will be sold out—guaranteed.

White + Warren

Cashmere Scarf

White + Warren's cashmere is chef's kiss.

& Other Stories

Pure Brushed-Cashmere Beanie

If you can't tell yet, I'm really into brushed cashmere.

LISA YANG

Brushed-Cashmere Mittens

Your hands will be so happy all winter long.

If you're looking to incorporate the cape trend into your winter wardrobe, this is the scarf to move forward with. The color, fabric, and brand—everything—are perfection.

bombas

Merino Cashmere Blend Rib Calf Socks

If you haven't tried Bombas socks yet, now is the time.

banana republic

Signature Cashmere Scarf

Who What Wear editors can't get enough of Banana Republic's signature cashmere.

Jenni Kayne

Cashmere Socks

Sale alert—don't miss out. 

& Other Stories

Cashmere Knit Scarf

This beautiful scarf comes in six other colors.

Lands' End

Ez Touch Screen Cashmere Lined Leather Gloves

For $67, I'm purchasing two pairs to place in each of my favorite coats.

This bold beanie is too cute to forget about anytime soon. 

By Anthropologie

Solid Cashmere Socks

Style these like a French fashion person by pairing them with a blazer, jeans, and loafers.

You can't beat this price point.

GUEST IN RESIDENCE

Cable-Knit Wool and Cashmere-Blend Balaclava

Winter weather has really been in full force lately, and balaclavas are the trendiest accessory keeping fashion people warm.

ARCH4

Jessie Ribbed Cashmere Gloves

Why only keep your hands warm when you can warm up your arms too?

NakedCashmere

The Cashmere Home Set

The perfect last-minute gift idea for yourself or someone on your list.

White + Warren

Cashmere Ribbed Sock Pack

Your feet deserve to receive a luxurious treatment.

Cos

Pure Brushed Cashmere Triangle Scarf

Don't miss out—this best-selling triangle scarf is selling out quickly!

I'd wear these in my reformer Pilates classes.

Nikki Chwatt is an associate fashion editor based in New York City. She joined Who What Wear in 2024 after writing fashion, beauty, and lifestyle content for WWD, Well+Good, Editorialist, and more. With a passion for personal style and the creativity that comes with it, one of Chwatt's goals is to help others understand that there is no such thing as a “good” or “bad” style; it’s just about putting an outfit together that makes you feel confident in yourself. When she's not writing, you can find her taking a Pilates class, reading a powerful romance novel, or exploring a new wellness spot in Manhattan.
